Description:
2 Bed Unit in a Location Filled with Convenience
This perfectly located unit is ripe for astute investors or first home buyers. With a sun filled north facing entrance and being only a moment from the Westall Train Station, Rosebank Avenue shops and both primary and secondary schools, this unit offers 2 gracious bedrooms with built in robes, open kitchen and meals area, flexible living area, LED downlights throughout, air conditioning, gas heating, central bathroom and being the only unit in the complex with a large private front yard.
Please contact me and I'd be happy to organise a time for you to inspect this gem.
Insights: Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
The perfect place to start
Whether you're entering the market for the first time or seeking a solid investment this delightfully presented brick home has all the answers. Sitting on a generous corner allotment of approximately 515sqm the home offers bright and modern living that includes generous living and dining room, updated kitchen, 3 good sized bedrooms - 2 with built in robes, a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Complete with evaporative cooling, ducted heating, outdoor entertaining area and carport and within minutes to Clarinda Shopping Centre, public transport and local schools.
Frank Scalise : 0488 144 833

Description:
Perfect First Home or Investment
An unbeatable location only minutes' walk to train station, Westall Primary School, Westall College, local parks and only a short drive to Monash Medical Centre and Monash Uni.
Property comprises large living room with gas heating and split system cooling leading to a modern kitchen with meals area and overlooking low maintenance courtyard. Two good sized bedrooms both with built in robes and massive family bathroom with a laundry and separate toilet. All this complemeted by a carport on title which presents a perfect opportunity to start your future investment or an ideal first home. For more information please contact Rene on 0413 330 357.

Description:
SOLD, SOLD, Another great result by Rene!!!
With its own street frontage and no body corporate fees, this single level beauty offers great living for the budget conscious.
This 2 bedroom unit features a very good size lounge with split system (cooling/heating), family size kitchen with gas cooking and large meals area. Recently renovated bathroom with separate toilet and laundry, conveniently overlooking low maintenance, but spacious backyard. This will impress many buyers! Both bedrooms have large built in robes and carpets over hardwood floors. Tiles in all the wet areas and gas heating. All this complimented by a single lock up garage, second car space and a large front yard.
Conveniently located in close proximity to Clayton Train Station, shops, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, local Community Centre, schools and the beautiful Keeley Park across the road.
Inspection a Must!
Insights: 2/1 Oakes Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2019 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Sharp, Stylish and Elegant!
This affordable and well maintained modern townhouse is an excellent opportunity for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
Fittingly, this townhouse does the coveted location justice, by offering a two-level layout that's high in style and quality yet low in maintenance. Downsizers will appreciate the ground-floor placement of the decent size bedroom, complete with built-in robes. Two additional bedrooms plus study area upstairs, and serviced by a central bathroom, master bedroom is serviced with balcony.
Strong contemporary appeal is what defines the stunning open-plan setting, styled with polished timber floorboards underfoot, a neutral colour scheme, loads of natural light and beautiful high ceilings. Quality stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops and sleek cabinets accentuate the modern character of the home, so too does the interior's seamless integration with a private courtyard.
Adding further appeal, this impressive residence enjoys the benefits of its own frontage and driveway, remote single garage, split air condition system covering all area.

Description:
To invest or to live in convenience
The apartment is situated only a walking distance to Clayton CBD, Clayton train station and public bus stops. It prides itself for firstly being low maintenance and being a prime location in Clayton. The apartment is surrounded with Restaurants, Chemists, Shops, Medical clinics, Banks, Aquatic centre with swimming pools and gym, Monash Public Library Service, child care services and much more. The feature of the apartment comprises of:
• A big modern bathroom with stone bench top vanity and bathtub.
• Quiet common court yard.
• Build in robe in a generous size Master bedroom.
• A lower ground multifunctional room/ second bedroom.
• Dual level living area.
• Underground gate key parking with 24 hour monitoring security system throughout the building.
• Split system air conditioning heating.
• Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliance.
• European style laundry.
• A warm north facing balcony to look down and greet your guest.
Buy your first home, live with convenience, and easy maintenance lifestyle. Or invest in a location where your investment is easily leased out in no time. Come and see it now before it is gone. Photo ID is required on inspection.

Description:
Designer Living In Prime Clayton South Locale
High in style yet low in maintenance, enjoy the full benefits of a modern Clayton South lifestyle with this excellent three-bedroom Townhouse that's central to it all!
For the homebuyer placing a premium on convenience, the walking distance proximity to Westall Secondary College, Westall train station, bus services, parklands and local shops is sure to please. Add to the mix excellent access to the Monash Medical Centre, the Clayton shopping strip, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre and it's clear to see why this location is highly sought.
The impressive design and modern character of this appealing residence is therefore the perfect accompaniment to this coveted neighbourhood, offering stunning open-plan living, downstairs accommodation for downsizers and quality appointments that will be appreciated by all.
Feature island bench topped with stone accentuates the functionality of the modern kitchen, which also benefits from easy-to-clean splashback, stainless steel appliances and sleek cabinetry. The seamless integration between the radiant open-plan living and low maintenance courtyard is also perfect during those summertime gatherings.
The close proximity of the downstairs bathroom and main bedroom (with walk-in robes) offers practicality for downsizers, while two additional bedrooms and a large bathroom (floating vanity, frameless shower and bath) are zoned in privacy upstairs.
Bathed in natural light, this standout home also features gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality tiled flooring, carpeted bedrooms, shed and double carport.

Description:
Backyard with Plans and Permits
Rare opportunity to purchase this backyard with approved plans and permits to construct a spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, single level, architect designed townhouse. North aspected, open plan, light-filled spaces nestled in a dream location around 30 minutes by train or car to the CBD.
Convenient access to local schools, Clayton shops, train station, community centre, library and award winning Clayton Aquatic and Fitness Centre. Set in a quiet street and a gentle stroll to beautiful Keeley Reserve and sports fields, and close to Monash Hospital and University.
Builder/developers and investors, take advantage of this affordable site, with all the hard work taken care of.

Description:
A STYLISH AND MODERN 3 BEDROOM HOME
Modern, fresh, spacious and right near shops, buses, Westall Secondary College and Westall train station, this light, airy townhouse will appeal to occupiers seeking a low maintenance lifestyle and investors chasing both returns and growth potential.
Terraced and in a street front position, it features a generous tiled lounge/dining room separated by a TV nook plus a beautiful kitchen with stainless appliances and stone benches.
There are 3 robed bedrooms upstairs including the master with a walk in wardrobe and an ensuite to match the family bathroom and additional powder room downstairs.
Ducted heating and a split system air conditioner provide additional comfort and there's also grass free landscaped courtyard with paved patio and water tank plumbed to the three toilets plus a rear entry double garage with remote controlled door.
A fantastic offering that must be inspected. Feel free to contact us with any questions.

Description:
A VERY NEAT REAR UNIT- WALKING DISTANCE TO CENTRAL CLAYTON
Set behind just one other home and a very short walk from central Clayton's shops, cafes, buses and train station, this unit defines low maintenance living. Ideally suited to a first home buyer, savvy investor or someone looking to downsize from a larger home, it has been kept in great condition with scope for its new owner to updated and put their own stamp on it. Inside you find an open living/dining area with a gas heater and a very neat kitchen with upright oven/stove. Surprisingly, there are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes plus a bathroom with separate toilet and an open laundry area. Outside there is a single carport and space to park another car plus a larger than expected grassed courtyard that is still easy to care for.

Description:
***UNDER OFFER***
Dual frontage land on your terms!
With two frontages and approx. 820sqm just two blocks to Westall station, this one adds up to Monash's most exciting development opportunity - with the added value of an up to 12 month settlement period.
Situated in a fast developing location close to the cosmopolitan Clayton retail, rail and restaurant precinct, this versatile property is primed to justify its location in this fast-developing easy-commute position. Just doors from newly upgraded First Street Reserve and minutes to Monash University and Medical Centre, this premier site is at the heart of transforming locale - surrounded by townhouse development and apartment refurbishment.
Offered with a very comfortable three bedroom, dual zone home in highly rentable or liveable condition with a skylit kitchen with dishwasher, an alarm, gas-heating, air-conditioner and carport, this prime site also offers the opportunity for a highly negotiable settlement with any period up to 12 months welcomed.
Pace out the land, look at the location, consider the terms, start counting the rewards this home will offer!

Description:
DECEASED ESTATE - MUST BE SOLD!
In a court like position, this classic orange brick home sits proudly on an elevated block and has been beautifully maintained throughout its life. With its brick front fence, neat gardens and timeless facade the home cuts a striking figure from the street and inside the home is largely original and in great condition. There is obvious appeal here for first home buyers and investors with great potential to update, renovate and add significant value or you may choose to start again and build your new family home (STCA) on this lovely block measuring around 550sqm. It features a generous lounge room with gas heater as well as a meals area adjoining the neat kitchen with updated stainless steel oven and cook top. There are 3 bedrooms with polished hardwood floors as well as a family bathroom, dual access toilet and a full laundry. Outside there is plenty of car accommodation between the single garage/workshop and the double carport that could easily be used as a covered entertaining space. In a street bordered by wetlands and Namatjira Park the home is also within minutes of Clayton South Primary School and central Clayton's shops and train station.

Description:
Living The Dream, Make It A Reality
Nearly New double storey townhouse with your own drive way (only two units on the block, land size: 370m2 approx).
For those who enjoy being surrounded by the finest fixtures and fittings, here is a carefully constructed three-bedroom detached townhouse that boasts the highest quality craftsmanship and modern design elements. And if you're the type of person who loves being at the centre of it all, a dream location central to local parks, schools, Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, Westall Train Station, and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
Ultra-modern, low maintenance living and privacy are hallmarks of this trendsetting residence, which presents young professionals and first homebuyers with a sophisticated sense of living. A downstairs generous size study area (potential fourth bedroom) serviced by a luxurious fully-tiled bathroom also presents a practical option for empty nesters looking to downsize whilst upgrading their lifestyle.
The home's stylish attributes are evident in the beautiful high ceilings, polished Tasmanian Oak timber floorboards and stunning open-plan layout that's the epitome of contemporary design. A super-stylish kitchen packs plenty of wow factors, impressing with its stunning stone benchtops, feature island bench and quality European stainless steel appliances (900mm cooktop and rangehood), while the interior's seamless integration with the low maintenance courtyard has summer night BBQs written all over it.
Three bedrooms are zoned in privacy upstairs, spacious master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, two more bedrooms with BIRs, plus modern central bathroom featuring floor-to-ceiling porcelain tiling, while central ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote control double lock up garage, alarm system, integrated network points, fully landscaped zen garden and quality fixtures and fittings adds further appeal.
Inspect now!

Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own enquires and refer to the due diligence check-list provided by Consumer Affairs. Description:
Young & Modern Apartment in Convenient Location
Attention first home buyers and investors, a contemporary 2 bedroom apartment in one of the most desirable pockets in Clayton South is ready for you to enjoy or to let straight away!
This boutique apartment complex is set on just a stone throw away to Westall Train Station and bus stops. Walking distance to Westall Primary and Secondary school, local shops, local parks and reserves. Easy access to Westall Rd, Princess Hwy, minutes' drive to Springvale central, Springvale Homemaker Centre, Clayton central and Monash Medical Centre.
Offering 2 good sized bedrooms with mirror BIRs, FES, stylish main bathroom with European laundry, a well-appointed S/S kitchen with stone benchtops, Bosch dish washer, open plan meal area adjoining living area with a split A/C. A sunny balcony is just perfect for relaxation and entertainment. Electronic Card access, Security Video intercom entry, an underground car park, a storage cage and visitors' car park. Water and Gas included in Body Corp.
Inspection by appointment.
Call Jun Lee today to secure this golden opportunity.
Photo ID Required for all Inspections

Description:
Exceptional Modern Elegance!
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
This architecturally designed townhouse with excellent craftsmanship throughout features ensuite and BIR to spacious master bedroom, two large bedrooms with build-in-robes, spacious living area, modern bathrooms, kitchen with island stone benchtop, stainless-steel appliances, gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling system, home security system, water tank and much, much more!
Easy access to your double lock up garage from your fabulous private outdoor area with low maintenance courtyard, it is a perfect and practical design for your daily life, plus entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
LEAVE THE CAR AT HOME!
Escape to your own slice of lifestyle paradise with this glamorous terrace residence, situated within meters of Botanic Reserve, Westall Train Station and Westall Primary and Secondary schools, you can leave the car at home. Adorned with quality appointments, the homes stylish interior flows effortlessly, revealing a formal lounge and dining room. Leading through to the adjacent family room, meals and kitchen incorporating waterfall stone benches, dish drawer dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bench, flowing onto the paved entertainer's courtyard. All three robed bedrooms are positioned on the upper level, master with mirrored built-in-robes and ensuite, accompanied by a family bathroom with toilet, plus downstairs laundry and 3rd toilet. Enhanced by ducted heating, alarm, water tank, high ceilings, under stair storage and double garage with rear laneway access. Perfectly positioned with convenience at your doorstep, walk to Westall Train Station, schools and local shops, close to Monash Medical Centre, Monash University plus Monash and EastLink Freeway access.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Great Four Bedroom Family Home
Enjoy the delights of this four bedroom residence with polished timber floors throughout. Comprising of formal lounge room , modern vinyl wrap kitchen with Caesar Stone benchtops including dishwasher, family room with wood heater and wall air conditioner, family bathroom, laundry , alfresco area and lock up garage including storage area on land of 580 sqm approximately.
Features include electric roller shutters, gas ducted heating , evaporative cooling, low maintenance gardens and easy access to public transport, shops and schools. Do not miss out on this fantastic opportunity!
